nodes.text: Why should Alice and Bob not be permitted to kill this chronically ill child?
For the pro-life community, the issue comes down to the fact that every human being has intrinsic value and worth, and their life is valuable for its own sake

Really? 'cuss what I always see with anti-choicers is that they seem to think that the pregnant woman is invisible. This means that all men and all fetuses have a right to life at all times, but women, for some unknown reason, seem to lose that right when they become pregnant. Weird.
You are so morally bankrupt that you're not even aware that it isn't the baby that created the situation the woman is in

And you are so uneducated that you don't even know that the woman's egg sends out a 'signal' which tells the sperm exactly where it is so that the pregnancy can begin. The newest forms of birth control are now working on ways to block that chemical 'signal' - but I guess you couldn't have learned that reading your funny papers emoticon_rolleyes
Before this thread is finished I'll be able to quote one of you subconsciously showing that you think the woman is invisible.
No, you probably won't be able to.
